snippet: In addition to laying off 600 corporate employees, the retailer said it would close a call center later this year, eliminating another 300 jobs.
abstract: J C Penney lays off 600 employees from its corporate headquarters, and will close a call center later in 2012, eliminating another 300 jobs.
lead_paragraph: In addition to laying off 600 corporate employees, the retailer said it would close a call center later this year, eliminating another 300 jobs.

headline.main: J.C. Penney Cuts 14% of Headquarters Staff
headline.print_headline: J.C. Penney Cuts 14% of Headquarters Staff
